text: @marcorubio Yeah, little Marco, assigning a science denier to lead the challenge of coronavirus is Rump’s 1st & biggest mistake. Also, who gives a f*ck WHERE the virus started, virologists will work on it. And Azar led his team to Travis WITHOUT proper protection! Dunce🖕🏼
